image.altText: Anthony Albanese and Paul Keating

items.synopsis: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese refuses to comment on Paul Keating's attack on the NATO secretary-general ahead of the alliance's meeting.

image.altText: Manasseh Sogavare shakes hands with his Chinese counterpart Li Qiang in front of flags from both of their countries.

image.altText: A young woman smiles at the camera.

image.altText: A collage of two photos side by side. One shows a woman with sunglasses walking head down. Another woman looks up and smiles.
